about.title: About Me
about.content: Hi! I'm Gleb, a dynamic 19-year-old student at Innopolis University. I'm deeply engaged in programming languages like Java, C++, and Python, and I'm fluent in English and Russian. Let's discuss interesting projects or share ideas!
about.content2: Although a significant part of my time is dedicated to studies, full-time employment with a tight schedule is not the best option for me right now. However, if there are job opportunities accommodating students' schedules, I'm ready for new opportunities.

resume.title: Resume
resume.content: Although I don't have traditional work experience, my journey is filled with continuous self-improvement. I have completed numerous courses to enhance my skills and stay at the forefront of my field. Additionally, I have participated in several projects, allowing me to apply and test my knowledge in practice. Rest assured, I know my craft and am always ready to take on new challenges and invest in new ventures.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.content: In this portfolio, you will find a comprehensive overview of my professional achievements, academic successes, projects, and works.
portfolio.InnoScheduleBot: InnoScheduleBot - Bot for Innopolis students' schedule.
portfolio.itstepCourses: Attended courses at IT Step Academy
portfolio.StryMarks: StryMarks - Website for tracking reading and viewing progress.
portfolio.TarotApp: TarotApp - Application for tarot card reading.

summary.title: Summary
summary.content: I approach every task with enthusiasm and genuine passion for what I do. Feedback and corrections are always welcome; I see them as opportunities for growth and improvement in my work.

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information
additionalInfo.current_course: Currently, I am a second-year student at Innopolis University, majoring in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence.

education.title: Education
education.faculty: Faculty of Computer and Engineering Sciences
education.afterspeach: These areas have not only enriched my understanding but also allowed me to participate in a wide range of projects and continuously expand my knowledge.
